tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My son had stepped over a few thorns (3 places) and my son was afraid to visit the Dr. But Dr. Meena Kumari treated very well and to me it was not less than any surgery. My son didn't cry as the procedure was handle very carefully and systematically.  Kudos to the Dr. Definitely recommended.
Very good doctor, explained each and every aspect. Very patient friendly , friendly doctor, staff behaviour was wonderful .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Last week I took my son(5Yrs) for treatment to Meena Kumari(Motherhood-Sarjapur). My son was suffering from Headache at that time and by that time he was under medication for stomach infection by taking tablet and syrup which referred by another doctor.  Meena Kumari checked my son and suggested me to do CBC,Dengue Test....bla bla.. like 6 tests and ask us to show all test reports by next day evening then only she can suggest the treatment. Upon my lot of requestes she suggested me to use Dolopal250 for Headache. * *** *** ********* *** ******** But i am not sure may be it can be used for Headache also.  **** *** ******* * **** ** *** ** ****** **** ****** **** *** ** ******* ***** *** *** ** **** ** ** ******* ******** *** **** *** ** ***** **** *** ****** ********* ******** ********** *** ** ***** *** *** ********* ** ***** ***** **** * ***** **** ***** ***** **** ******* ** *** *** ****** ** ******* *** ** *** ****** **** ****** *** **** ***** **** ** **** **** *** *** ** ********** ********  I couldn't understand why she preferred that many tests?

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Motherhood has to seriously rethink about this doctor. I have had multiple interactions with her and common observation is that she has absolutely no connect with the patient and the issue. She has left me totally confused on what should be done to get the issue healed. Advice: do not visit her.

Dr. Meena ** ********** *** unprofessional doctor, if any one want to play with dear baby then only consult with her.
My experience was really horrible with her.
Strongly not recommended.
My kid was diagnosed with COVID and doctor made herself available during odd timing due to urgency. Her treatment helped my kid to recover. I would highly recommend.
Meena Kumari is a excellent Doctor.she explained everything very nicely I’m very happy. My brother  has suggested  me her name for my .Thanks dr Meena

** ***** ****** ******** ** ******* * ***** ** **** ****** ** *********** *********** ***** * ***** ******* ***** ***** *** ** ** *** *** she will not even respond(on whatsapp which will be asked  by the same doctor to do so in first place to share scan results) to your queries after you share the results of the prescribed tests. I request parents to take their infants to any other doctor available in MotherHood hospitals as I wouldn't recommend Dr Meena

Doctor not friendly with babies. Handling of babies was very rough.If she wont touch a 2 months old baby who is crying in discomfort whats the point in travelling to her. On insisting she handled baby bit roughly.
Though Dr is good, but I felt she has a bit of communication problem but she did her best and explained things multiple times and some times repetition becomes the problem.
